articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Disturbing Businessmen' Work to Adjust Properties
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Disturbing Businessmen' Work to Adjust Properties
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Guidance Bureau of the Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday as regards the negotiations for the adjustment of real estate of the south side in Mt. Kumgang resort:
					 The DPRK recently took measures to let those concerned of the south side enter Mt. Kumgang resort to discuss the issue of adjusting real estates there and do business and property registration again and either take part in the international tour at their will or dispose of their properties by way of lease, transfer and sale according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on setting up the special zone for international tour of Mt. Kumgang and the DPRK law on special zone for international tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 This was prompted by the purport to resume the tour at an early date and show the nation's famous mountain to an increasing number of people at home and abroad and meet the interests of the south side's businesses under the situation where the suspension of the tour drags on due to the unjust behavior of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The south authorities, however, approached the measures taken by the DPRK with insincerity. They deliberately blocked the south side's businessmen from entering Mt. Kumgang resort for the adjustment of their properties. In face of the DPRK's criticism and protest by businesses, the authorities brought with them only a few businesses out of more than 30 businesses holding real estate in Mt. Kumgang resort. And they, insisting on authorities' negotiations only, prevented the businesses from meeting those from the north side and did not allow them to speak out at the negotiating table.
					
					 There were two attempted negotiations for the adjustment of the properties in Mt. Kumgang resort but the north side could not have an opportunity to properly talk to NGO businessmen of south side.
					
					 Taking into consideration the embarrassing position of the south side's businesses suffering undeserved damage due to the authorities' arbitrary practices, the north side decided to finally clinch the above-said issue by giving them more time till July 29.
					
					 The south Korean authorities, far from feeling responsibility for it, stuck to their unreasonable stand, talking about "retract of the law on special zone", "breach of south-north agreement" and "infringement upon property right". They even proposed authorities' working talks, revealing their attempt to elbow out NGO businesses and have the negotiations for the adjustment of properties and those for the tour to themselves.
					
					 Meanwhile, they talked about "sticking to the existing stand" on the issue of resuming the south Koreans' tour, an issue drawing attention of domestic and foreign public, thereby betraying their ulterior design to build a higher barrier.
					
					 The DPRK declared the area for tour of Mt. Kumgang as a special zone for international tour and enacted a special law according to it. This was a legitimate measure taken to cope with the south Korean authorities' unilateral suspension of the tour for three years under an absurd pretext.
					
					 As for "breach of agreement" and "infringement upon the right to properties", it was none other than the south side which breached and scrapped the agreement reached between Hyundai and the DPRK and it was again the south Korean authorities who caused the DPRK and the south side's businesses such big losses.
					
					 The DPRK and Hyundai made the tour of Mt. Kumgang successful, by cooperating with each other. But the south Korean authorities unilaterally suspended it without any consultation with the parties concerned and have so far stood in the way of resuming it.
					
					 As far as the case of a tourist which the south Korean authorities put up as a pretext for suspending the tour is concerned, the south side was entirely to blame for the case as it was an incident that took place because the south side failed to put its personnel under proper control and thus the tourist illegally trespassed on the area under the military control of the north side.
					
					 The south side also failed to pay a large portion of money it owed to the north side for the tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 There is no room to talk about the north-south agreement at present and it has already become a dead paper.
					
					 Under this situation the DPRK invested the Hyundai with the right to do south Koreans' tour under the new law on the special zone and offered the south side's businesses the opportunity to hold negotiations for the protection of their properties. This was the biggest favor shown by the DPRK.
					
					 In fact, the DPRK's sovereignty is exercised over the special zone for international tour of Mt. Kumgang. So, the adjustment of properties in this area can be done under the DPRK's law and it does not require any discussion with the south side.
					
					 The south Korean authorities, however, behaved arrogantly and disturbed the work to adjust the properties, reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" An aim sought by them is to torpedo the international tour and block the resumption of the south Koreans' tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 This petty trick will no longer work on anyone.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should allow the entry of the south side's businesses holding their properties in Mt. Kumgang resort by July 29 so that they may do business and property registration and decide to take part in the international tour or lease, transfer or sell their properties.
					
					 On this premise, the DPRK will consider authorities' working talks proposed by the south side authorities. 
					
					 The DPRK is ready for both international tour and resumption of the south Koreans' tour.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities try to use the working talks between authorities, defying the just demand of the DPRK and elbowing out NGO businessmen, as a lever for disturbing the implementation of the above-said law and the adjustment of the properties of the south side's businesses, the DPRK will not accept the authorities' working talks but take strong legal measures to dispose of the south side's properties as it had already declared.

articles.title: Report on Results of Local Election in DPRK Released
articles.content:
Report on Results of Local Election in DPRK Released 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Election Guidance Committee of the DPRK on Tuesday released a report on the results of the election of deputies to local people's assemblies. 
					 According to the report, the election of deputies to the provincial (municipal), city (district) and county people's assemblies was successfully held at all the constituencies across the country on Sunday as required by the law on the election of deputies to the people's assemblies at all levels.
					
					 According to the election returns available from the election committees of provinces (municipalities), cities (districts) and counties, 99.97 percent of all the voters registered in the lists took part in the election and voted for the candidates for deputies registered in the relevant constituencies. 
					
					 Only those on foreign tour or working in oceans could not take part in the election. 
					
					 28 116 workers, farmers, intellectuals and officials who have devotedly worked for improving the standard of people's living and building a thriving nation true to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea were elected deputies to the local people's assemblies. 
					
					 The recent election fully displayed once again before the world the unshakable faith and will of the Korean people to realize without fail the wish of President Kim Il Sung for a thriving nation by adding steady spurs to the Chollima of Songun and to an all-out offensive, united close around the WPK Central Committee headed by leader Kim Jong Il. It also fully demonstrated the might of the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks and advantages of Korean-style socialism. 
					
					 The election marked an important occasion in consolidating the people's power of the DPRK by building new local power bodies with able officials, representatives of workers, farmers and intellectuals who are devoting themselves to the party and the leader, the country and its people and dashing ahead at the head of the advance for a great surge to improve the standard of people's living while pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology.

articles.title: National Meeting Celebrates War Victory Day in DPRK
articles.content:
National Meeting Celebrates War Victory Day in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place on Tuesday at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium to celebrate the 58th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 July 27, Juche 42 (1953), was the day of second liberation when the army and the people of the DPRK under the distinguished guidance of President Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S.-led imperialist aggressors to win the historic victory and honorably defended the freedom and independence of the country and gains of the revolution.
					
					 Attending the meeting were senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, war veterans, servicemen's families, working people, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 Thanks to the prominent leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the army and the people of the DPRK defeated the enemies' numerical and technical superiority by means of the politico-ideological, strategic and tactical superiority and thus set a shining example of the revolutionary war against imperialism, the reporter said.
					
					 The victory in the Fatherland Liberation War made the DPRK and its people proudly emerge the heroic country and people that defeated the two formidable imperialisms in one century, and this gave a great encouragement to the world revolutionary people standing against the outsiders' aggression and aspiring after independence, he said, adding:
					
					 The immortal feats performed by the President for the victory in the war and the precious tradition established by him have been steadily inherited and developed under the distinguished Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has successfully carried forward the President's idea and line of giving importance to the army and military affairs. He has led the Korean army and people in the struggle against the U.S.-led imperialists, starting his Songun revolutionary leadership at the beginning of the 1960s.
					
					 He put forward the KPA as the core unit and the main force of the revolution and established the Songun politics as the basic mode of politics under socialism, thus providing a powerful weapon for the struggle to defend the country and confront with the U.S.-led imperialists.
					
					 The DPRK has displayed its dignity as an invincible politico-ideological power and world-leading military giant, winning victories one after another in the showdown with the imperialist allied forces. With this strong military guarantee, the Korean army and people have worked world-startling miracles and feats in the drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The credit for all those successes goes to Kim Jong Il, legendary Songun brilliant commander and peerlessly patriot who has been held in high esteem as the top leader of the party, the army and the state. 
					
					 The reporter urged all the servicepersons and people to resolutely smash the vicious and reckless anti-DPRK confrontational moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group and bring about a decisive turn in building a thriving socialist country and accomplishing the cause of national reunification under the Songun leadership of the great Party.
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the heinous political and military provocations committed by the south Korean group of traitors and its military hooligans under the patronage of the U.S., he noted, saying:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has got hell-bent on the confrontation with the DPRK in disregard of the DPRK's sincere efforts for peace and reunification. It is committing in succession such never-to-be-condoned treacherous and anti-reunification actions as persistently insulting the dignity of the DPRK's leadership and slandering its system and the army.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have regarded the reckless moves of the group adding to the hideous crimes against the nation as a declaration of a new war. With arms of justice for retaliation they will wipe out the group of traitors without parallel from this land and surely accomplish the historic cause of national reunification at an earlier date.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greetings to Vietnamese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greetings to Vietnamese President
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Truong Tan Sang upon his election as president at the first meeting of the 13th People's Assembly of Vietnam.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation formed on the road of struggle for anti-imperialism and socialism would continue to grow stronger in conformity with the common interests and desire of the two peoples and wished him success in his responsible work as well as good health and happiness.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulations to Nigerian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulations to Nigerian FM
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun sent a congratulatory message to Olugbenga Ayodeji Ashiru upon his appointment as foreign minister of Nigeria on Monday.
					 Pak wished him success in his new office and expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop as desired by their peoples.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the 58th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The floral basket and letter were conveyed to an official concerned by Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy here who is doyen of the military attaches corps, on Tuesday.

articles.title: "Friendship Pavilion" Commissioned at Russian Embassy
articles.content:
"Friendship Pavilion" Commissioned at Russian Embassy
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A "friendship pavilion", a Korean-style pavilion, was commissioned in the compound of the Russian embassy here with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					 Present there on invitation were Mun Jae Chol, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Ambassador Valery E. Sukhinin and staff members of the Russian embassy here were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The speakers referred to the fact that the pavilion has been built as a symbol of traditional DPRK-Russia friendship in a significant period of marking the 10th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Russia and the 10th anniversary of the adoption of the DPRK-Russia Moscow declaration.
					
					 They expressed the belief that the history of the friendship between the two countries would be given steady continuity.

articles.title: Chinese Embassy Officials Visit Historic Site Associated with War
articles.content:
Chinese Embassy Officials Visit Historic Site Associated with War 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials Tuesday visited the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War on the 58th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					 They toured the commanding post of the Supreme Headquarters, the operation room and other parts of the site, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung elaborated on the operational plan and led the Korean army and people to victory while staying there during the war. 
					
					 They also went round various historic relics associated with the activities of general secretary Kim Jong Il, who grasped the President's Juche-based military idea and tactics and commanding art while staying there during the war.

articles.title: DPRK Students Win Three Gold Medals at IMO
articles.content:
DPRK Students Win Three Gold Medals at IMO
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK students won three gold medals at the 52nd International Math Olympiad.
					 They are Mun Hak Myong, Mun So Min and Hong Chung Song of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1.
					
					 The Olympiad held in the Netherlands from July 17 to 23 brought together more than 560 students from over 100 countries and region.
					
					 Math problems in the fields of theory of numbers, algebra, geometry and combinatorics were presented.
					
					 The DPRK students successfully solved difficult problems requiring high concentration and thinking power. 
					
					 Ri Yong Hyon and Ryu Song Chol of Pyongyang Secondary School No.1 and Kim Hyo Song of East Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 received silver medals.

articles.title: Youth and Students in DPRK Mark War Victory Day
articles.content:
Youth and Students in DPRK Mark War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- An oratorical meeting of youth and students from across the country took place at the Youth Park Open-air Theatre in Pyongyang on Tuesday in celebration of the 58th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The performers at the meeting praised the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for the victory in the war and expressed the resolution to remain faithful to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Kum Il, a student of Sinuiju University of Light Industry in North Phyongan Province, said in his oratory titled "Ever-victorious Brilliant Commander" that the President is a gifted strategist and ever-victorious iron-willed commander as he dealt a heavy blow to the U.S.-led imperialist aggressors and set a brilliant example of the anti-imperialist revolutionary war.
					
					 Kim Un Gyong, a member of the youth league in Rason City, in her oratory "Matchless Pluck" referred to the President's personality as a great man. Foreseeing the victorious future of Korea, the President recalled soldiers to their universities from the front and saw to it that soldiers took part in the 3rd World Festival of Youth and Students during the war, she stressed.
					
					 Kim Yong Hwa, a worker of the Capital City Passenger Transport Guidance Bureau, in her oratory "At a Breath" told about the indomitable mental power of servicepersons who have devotedly implemented the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il in the construction of the Ryongrim dam of Huichon Power Station No. 1 as the heroic soldiers in the 1950s did.
					
					 Jang Kwang Il, a student of Hamhung Railway Director Training College, and Ju Hyon Gol, a worker of the Kumya County House of Culture, expressed the iron will of five million youths never to pardon anyone if he or she encroaches on the dignity of the DPRK's leadership.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, youth league officials and youth and students in the City of Pyongyang.

articles.title: DPRK Taekwon-Do Demonstration Admired by Americans
articles.content:
DPRK Taekwon-Do Demonstration Admired by Americans
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Young man and woman have a talk on a bench. Three gangsters walk towards them to assault the man and harass the woman. When the rogues try to take her away, the young man flings himself to them and knocks them down in a flash. 
					 This is a program performed by a DPRK Taekwon-Do player together with an American girl during the DPRK Taekwon-Do demonstration tour of the United States.
					
					 The program won a burst of applause from spectators. 
					
					 The demonstration team toured three U.S. eastern cities, including New York, for a weeklong period from June 9, fully displaying the spirit of Taekwon-Do, the traditional martial art of the Korean nation.
					
					 Americans warmly welcomed the demonstration team. Some people learnt how to play Taekwon-Do, posed for photo and exchanged autographs with DPRK players.
					
					 Chairmen of both chambers of the New Jersey Assembly in a joint letter congratulated the players on their successful performance, saying their remarkable talent, high-level technique and energetic performance won Americans' respect and admiration.
					
					 The chairman of the U.S. Senate Foreign Relations Committee said this year's cultural exchange would help promote reconciliation, friendship and peace between the two countries.
					
					 It is a common desire of the Korean and American people to dispel misunderstanding and distrust and establish normal relations based on understanding, respect and trust between the two countries.
					
					The demonstration tour served as an occasion confirming the common desire. Relations between countries may suffer ups and downs, but they are not immutable. Nations amend wrong bilateral relations and develop them to suit public aspiration and demand. There is no change in this trend of the historical development. 
					
					 The demonstration tour showed the DPRK and the U.S. people have great potentials of understanding and cooperation.
					
					 Now they find no mental hurdle in going well with each other. The improvement of relations between the DPRK and the U.S. requires a strategic and historic decision to put an end to the long-standing hostile relations.

articles.title: Environmental Protection Regulations Enacted in DPRK
articles.content:
Environmental Protection Regulations Enacted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently released a decision on enacting regulations for the implementation of the Law on the Protection of Environment. 
					 The enactment is aimed to, through the implementation of the law, landscape the country, improve the people's health and provide them with better living and working conditions.
					
					 The regulations are made up of four chapters and 60 articles.
					
					 The first chapter stipulates the applicable objects of the regulations and principles of the DPRK in environmental protection.
					
					 The second contains what should be maintained in preserving and creating natural environment.
					
					 The third and fourth give guidelines for preventing environmental pollution and intensifying supervision over the environmental protection.
					
					 In this regard, the Cabinet's decision "On Approving Regulations for Implementation of the Law on the Protection of Environment", which was endorsed in October Juche 88 (1999), has become invalid.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Help Korean Workers
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Help Korean Workers
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and staff members of the Cuban embassy here did friendly labor at the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Factory Tuesday to mark the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					 They looked round the room dedicated to the history of the factory after being briefed on it before the monuments to on-site instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then they helped employees of the factory in grass cutting.
					
					 During a break they exchanged conversations with its officials, deepening friendship.

articles.title: DPRK Girls Beat Chinese Rivals in Juvenile Football Matches
articles.content:
DPRK Girls Beat Chinese Rivals in Juvenile Football Matches
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK and China had juvenile football matches at Yanggakdo Football Stadium in Pyongyang.
					 The DPRK national team defeated the Chinese national team 5:0 in the first match on July 21.
					
					 The DPRK's Wolmido and April 25 teams won other matches 1:0 respectively on July 23 and 25.
					
					 The Chinese girls arrived in Pyongyang on July 19.

articles.title: DPRK Papers Reject Remarks of Chairman of U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff
articles.content:
DPRK Papers Reject Remarks of Chairman of U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff clamored about "threat" from the DPRK and "possibility of additional provocation", speaking to reporters during his recent junket to south Korea.
					 Commenting on his provocative remarks, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 The remarks were aimed to shift the blame for escalated military tension on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK and thus expand lever of international pressure upon the DPRK and find a pretext for armed invasion of it.
					
					 The U.S. is a wire-puller and mastermind that zealously protects the south Korean puppet forces and instigates them to armed provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 It is not without reason that last year the chairman visited south Korea to work out with the puppet military warmongers a detailed plan for the second Yonphyong Island shelling "led by the south Korean army and backed by the U.S. troops" and incite those war servants' belligerence.
					
					 During his recent visit, he again instigated the puppet forces to confrontation and war while pulling up the DPRK for no ground. This clearly shows his bellicose nature and enmity towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces have shown their stance for confrontation with the DPRK at an important time when an atmosphere of detente is being created on the Korean Peninsula, Minju Joson in a bylined commentary says, adding: This evidently proves that their call for peace is just a deceptive trick.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Anniversary of Work Marked
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Anniversary of Work Marked
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday devotes a bylined article to the 15th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy".
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), clearly explains that the historic exploit performed by the Juche philosophy in the development of philosophical thought lies in that it clarified new philosophical principles centered on man, not in that it developed the preceding philosophy of the working class. The work also clarifies that it is hard to properly understand the quintessence of the Juche philosophy, if it is explained within the framework of the preceding philosophy. 
					
					 The clarification that the Juche philosophy is an original one quite different from the preceding philosophy provided an ideological and theoretical weapon for conducting study of the Juche philosophy and explaining it strictly in line with the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Juche philosophy clarifies in a unique manner that man is the only social being and man has intrinsic characteristics--independence, creativeness and consciousness.
					
					 The overall establishment of Juche-oriented understanding of man thanks to the Juche philosophy helped put an end to the wrong view that the intrinsic nature of man is an extension of his natural and biological attribute and its development and perfection, firmly preserve the purity of the Juche philosophy and lay a solid ideological foundation of Korea-style socialism centered on the popular masses. 
					
					 Korean-style socialism could win victory after victory by displaying its advantages even under the complicated world political situation because the WPK has resolutely defended socialism by retaining a firm grip on the Juche philosophy centered on man, on the popular masses. 
					
					The Juche philosophy is a revolutionary doctrine that correctly reflected wishes and desire of the popular masses and generalized and formulated a wealth of experience gained under the leadership of the party and the leader. For this reason, the Juche philosophy serves as a popular one which everybody can easily understand and accept in the struggle as a weapon and encyclopedia giving answers to all questions arising in revolution and construction. 
					
					 Everything the WPK conceives and designs stems from the most correct view and stand toward the popular masses, the article concludes.

articles.title: Worthwhile Life under Care of Great Leader (23)
articles.content:
Worthwhile Life under Care of Great Leader (23)
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- There happened a great jubilee in the country in July 2002.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il read a letter of thanks from Ri Jae Ryong, a former unconverted long-term prisoner, and his wife, greatly excited by the birth of a daughter of their happy family under the care of the socialist homeland, and sent the following autograph to them: 
					
					 "I propose naming the baby Chuk Bok as she was born amid the blessings of the people across the country. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il July 23, 2002."
					
					 Words failed to express thanks to him for projecting the former unconverted long-term prisoners as indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighters and men strong in faith and will. And that time, he was so meticulous as give the name to their first baby. The warm care shown by the leader was the great fatherly love to be handed down generation after generation.
					
					 Ri Chuk Bok, who was happily growing under the care of the leader, sent during her kindergarten days a letter to him, pledging herself to become as good person as her father and repay his boundless solicitude.
					
					A three-year pupil of Pyongyang Changjon Primary School, she is now stoutly growing, given an ample opportunity of learning.
					
					 Not only Chuk Bok but all other children across the country are leading a happy life and the people are working hard to build a thriving nation thanks to the blessings of the great sun. This is the brilliant reality and the future of the socialist country.

articles.title: Stop to S. Korean Military Authorities' Moves to Introduce Weapons for Aggression Demanded
articles.content:
Stop to S. Korean Military Authorities' Moves to Introduce Weapons for Aggression Demanded
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean People for Achieving Peace and Reunification staged a demonstration outside the Ministry of Defense on July 20 in demand of a stop to the moves to introduce weapons for the purpose of making preparations for a war against the north.
					 It denounced the military authorities for submitting to the authorities a 2012 draft military budget including expenses for the introduction of large offensive helicopters.
					
					  The projected introduction of the helicopters poses a grave threat to the peace on the Korean Peninsula as it is part of the moves to carry out the strategy for a preemptive attack on the north, it held.
					
					 It demanded the military authorities stop at once the moves to introduce helicopters with a huge amount of funds collected from the people as taxes.

articles.title: Cameroonian President Visits China
articles.content:
Cameroonian President Visits China
 Beijing, July 25 (KCNA) -- Cameroonian President Paul Biya visited China from July 20 to 22.
					 During the visit he had talks with President Hu Jintao, and met with Wu Bangguo, chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, and Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council of China, to converse with each of them.
					
					 Discussed at the talks and conversations were the issue of boosting the bilateral relations and other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 A series of agreements on cooperation were signed between the two countries during the visit.
					
					 While staying in China, the Cameroonian president toured Tianjin City.

articles.title: Lebanon Condemns Israeli Unreasonable Behavior
articles.content:
Lebanon Condemns Israeli Unreasonable Behavior
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Lebanese Minister of Energy and Water Resources Gebran Bassil at a press conference Friday condemned Israel for its unreasonable behavior.
					 Recently the Israeli authorities approved the map delineating the southern territorial waters of Lebanon covering 860 square km abundant in natural resources as ones of Israel. The minister termed it an illegal encroachment.
					
					 The Lebanese government and parliament would mobilize all means according to international law in order to protect the country's natural resources and rights, he declared.

articles.title: Anti-U.S. Demonstration in Jordan
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. Demonstration in Jordan
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of Jordanians held a demonstration on July 22 in protest against the U.S. interference in their country's internal affairs.
					 The demonstrators burnt a U.S. flag in a street, calling upon all the people to get united to cope with the U.S. interference in the internal affairs of Jordan.

articles.title: Quake Hits Fiji
articles.content:
Quake Hits Fiji
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A 6-magnitude earthquake hit Fiji on July 22.
					 The epicenter was the Sea of Fiji.

articles.title: Natural Damage in Different Countries
articles.content:
Natural Damage in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Tropical storms hit Laos, causing damage.
					 They left 15 persons dead in Vientiane and other provinces and many farmlands, dwelling houses, roads and infrastructure destroyed as of July 21.
					
					 The material losses amount to about 62 million U.S. dollars.
					
					 Heavy rains fell in southern Bangladesh recently. The flood left six persons dead, about 200 villages inundated and more than 10 000 inhabitants homeless as of July 22.
					
					 Shrimp breeding grounds and farmlands were destroyed.
					
					 Landslides broke out due to heavy rain in the area close to Kathmandu of Nepal on July 22. 16 persons were killed and 50 wounded.

articles.title: Works Posted on Finnish Internet
articles.content:
Works Posted on Finnish Internet
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Finnish Mangyongdae Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly posted on an Internet homepage on July 19 the full texts of the President's works "Answers to Questions Put by the Correspondent of a Finnish Newspaper" and "Answers to Questions Raised by the Delegation of the Democratic Youth League of Finland for the Kansan Uutiset, Central Organ of the Communist Party of Finland".
					 The work "Answers to Questions Put by the Correspondent of a Finnish Newspaper", published on Nov. 28, 1958, says that the continued tension in Korea is mainly due to the occupation of south Korea by the U.S. troops and their violation of the Armistice Agreement and instigating the south Korean puppet clique to a war. It also refers to the DPRK's relations with other countries and its foreign policy.
					
					 The work "Answers to Questions Raised by the Delegation of the Democratic Youth League of Finland for the Kansan Uutiset, Central Organ of the Communist Party of Finland", published on Sept. 2, 1969, deals with the steps for solution to the issue of Korea's reunification, the DPRK's foreign policy, etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Local Legislators Call for North-South Reconciliation, Interchange
articles.content:
S. Korean Local Legislators Call for North-South Reconciliation, Interchange
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Legislators of Kwangju City and its districts in south Korea on July 20 organized a society for invigorating reconciliation and interchange between the north and south of Korea, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 They will reportedly sponsor lectures and seminars to find out what local assemblies should do in improving the bilateral relations. 
					
					They said that, through such activities, local governments and assemblies should promote the work for north-south interchange.

articles.title: Miserable Defeat of U.S. in Korean War
articles.content:
Miserable Defeat of U.S. in Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists suffered a disastrous defeat in the Korean war fought from June 25, 1950 to July 27, 1953.
					 In the war they lost more than 12,200 planes, 560 vessels, 3,200 tanks and armored vehicles, 13,300 trucks, 7,690 guns and many other combat equipment and war supplies. Over 1 567 000 enemy troops, including 405,000 U.S. soldiers, were arrested, wounded or killed.
					
					 They started the war to invade the DPRK founded a few years ago.
					
					 The U.S. mobilized in the war one third of its army, one fifth of its air force and most of its Pacific Fleet. It also inveigled into the war troops of its fifteen allies, south Korean puppet army and Japanese militarists, more than two million in all, as well as huge combat equipment.
					
					 The invaders indiscriminately destroyed and burnt everything in the DPRK and even illegally used germ and chemical weapons to massacre Korean people.
					
					 They launched a general Christmas offensive, Thanksgiving Day offensive, summer and autumn offensive, Kimhwa offensive and many other operations. U.S. presidents Harry Truman and Dwight Eisenhower, UN forces commanders Douglas MacArthur, Ridgway and Clark and other U.S. generals Walker and Dean were involved in the war. 
					
					 But the U.S. imperialists surrendered to the Korean people, sustaining a heavy loss 2.3 times that in the Pacific war.
					
					 Thanks to President Kim Il Sung's outstanding military ideas, tactics, military wisdom and commanding art, the Korean army and people defeated the U.S. that was styling itself the strongest in the world.
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War of the Korean people against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces demonstrated that nobody could match the popular masses seeking justice and peace, closely united around their party and leader.

articles.title: Chinese Newspaper Accuses West of Abusing Anti-Terrorism Issue
articles.content:
Chinese Newspaper Accuses West of Abusing Anti-Terrorism Issue
 Beijing, July 25 (KCNA) -- The Chinese newspaper Beijing Daily carried an article titled "Chinese Can Never Accept West's Unreasonable Logic" on July 22.
					 Some Western media spread misinformation as regards China's protest against the U.S. president's meeting with the Dalai Lama and the country's proper dealing with violent and terrorist incidents in Xinjiang, the daily said, adding: 
					
					 Such misinformation is not the first for Western media. It is not the first time either for them to apply double standards in judging China combating divisive moves and violent and terrorist activities.
					
					 From the historical point of view, the United States and other Western nations have often played a disgraceful role in such activities in other countries, developing nations in particular. Taking Tibet as an example, Britain began openly stretching out its claws of aggression to Tibet in the late 19th century. Failing in two invasions, it instigated separatists to claim "independence of Tibet", trying several times to attain its goal to divide China in international arenas.
					
					 After the end of the Second World War, the United States began interfering in the Tibet region. It was directly involved in a rebellion in Tibet, attempted to help the Dalai Lama escape from the region and disturbed the situation of the border area through assaults. It also supported the Dalai Lama group to conduct protracted divisive activities in the international community. It is still refusing to take its hands off Tibet.
					
					 In recent years, the West's moves for Chinese division are not confined to Tibet only. The West supported the separatists in Xingjiang by all means and even incited violence and terrorism there. Western forces were behind all terrorist acts committed in Xinjiang in recent years.
					
					 We must be clearly aware of it and discard a naive dream that the West would support China in anti-terrorist battle. We must defend unity and solidarity and categorically reject the West's persistent interference in Chinese affairs.
					
					 The world has many lessons we must learn. The U.S. chooses its allies for the sake of its interests, leaves no stone unturned for destruction and disturbance, cause unrests in other nations and regions and even interfere in their affairs by force of arms. 
					
					 If a nation favors the West, it is termed a champion of freedom, democracy and human rights, enjoying support from the West. 
					
					 If a nation opposes the West, it is branded as dictatorial and cruel state and terrorist organization, becoming a target of the West's attack. This is just the far-fetched logic proper to the Western nations, particularly the U.S.
					
					 The logic makes it difficult to identify who supports terrorism and violence. In fact, many countries were put to shame due to Western countries' double standards and misinformation. China also suffered a heavy loss.
					
					 As regards the anti-terrorism issue, China will join in international cooperation but will oppose slandering and groundlessly blaming others for one's own purpose. It will never allow others to interfere in its internal affairs under this or that pretext.

articles.title: Iranian President Calls for Not Being Deceived by U.S., Israel
articles.content:
Iranian President Calls for Not Being Deceived by U.S., Israel
 Tehran, July 25 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad recently called on regional countries not to be deceived by the United States and Israel.  
					 Addressing a ceremony, he revealed that the U.S. and Israel are trying to hoodwink nations in the region.
					
					 To be deceived leads to ruin, he noted.
					
					 Friendship with Iran will be favorable for all other nations in the region, he said. Iran will strongly counter any negative practice in the region.

articles.title: CPC Central Committee to Hold 6th Plenum in October
articles.content:
CPC Central Committee to Hold 6th Plenum in October
 Beijing, July 25 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee met on July 22.
					 The meeting decided to have the 6th Plenary Session of the 17th CPC Central Committee in October.
					
					 The present economic situation of the country was also discussed at the meeting.

articles.title: China Promotes Six Generals
articles.content:
China Promotes Six Generals
 Beijing, July 25 (KCNA) -- China's Central Military Commission (CMC) conferred the rank of general on six senior military officers on Saturday.
					 Participating in the promotion ceremony held in Beijing were the CMC Chairman Hu Jintao, vice-chairmen Xi Jinping, Guo Boxiong and Xu Caihou and other officials.

articles.title: Chinese Party Official Calls for Training Able Persons
articles.content:
Chinese Party Official Calls for Training Able Persons
						
 Beijing, July 25 (KCNA) -- Li Yuanchao, head of the Organization Department of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee, called for intensifying the training of able persons on July 20.
					 He, who is also a member of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee, made the call at 32nd meeting of the central group for able persons. 
					
					 Li underscored the need to implement the state program for development of able persons, intensify the work for training young talents and help them distinguish themselves.

articles.title: Orders, Medals to be Renewed in Chinese Army
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Disturbing Businessmen' Work to Adjust Properties
 Beijing, July 25 (KCNA) -- The General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army issued a notice on using new orders, medals, commemoration medals and commendation certificates in the army from August 1, 2011.
					 The notice points out that their use is of great importance in carrying forward the excellent traditions of the army, renewing the form of commendation and successfully performing the historic mission of the army.

articles.title: War Victory Day of DPRK Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
War Victory Day of DPRK Celebrated Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on July 18 and 19 to mark the 58th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 There were a rally in Bulgaria and seminars and film shows in Russia and Austria.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films on the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union and other speakers noted that the army and people of the DPRK won a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the postwar rehabilitation and construction and built in Korea a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The director for administration of the Moscow Bank of Russia said it was of very weighty significance in ensuring global peace and stability that the Korean people won in the war under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna and other speakers said the Songun idea founded by the President and carried forward and developed by Kim Jong Il serves as a sure guarantee for the Korean people in defending socialism.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Chinese People's University visited Kim Il Sung University on Monday.
					 It laid a bouquet before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the university and paid tribute to him.
					
					 The delegation members went round reading halls, the computer education room, the remote-control lecture room and the room for academic exchange in the E-library of the university.
					
					 The delegation also visited University of National Economics, the Grand People's Study House and other places.

articles.title: Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign media edited special write-ups on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Cambodian paper Pracheachon on July 20 carried an article illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The victory won by the Korean people in the war against the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion nearly six decades ago would be unthinkable without Kim Il Sung's outstanding military strategy.
					
					 The AKP News Agency of Cambodia on July 19 reported about the undying feats the President performed by leading the war to victory.
					
					 The Indian paper Defence and Humanity on July 21 referred in detail to the fact that the President beat back the enemy's attack with a prompt counter-attack right after the outbreak of the war and wisely commanded the battle for the liberation of Seoul.
					
					 Looking back on the world war history, there was no precedent that a country, which had been exposed to surprise invasion, made a swift switchover in the phase of war, the paper said.
					
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer on July 15 said ever-changing diverse war methods applied by the President during the war tell he was the only outstanding strategist in the world.

articles.title: Publicada informacion del resultado de elecciones de diputados
articles.content:
Publicada informacion del resultado de elecciones de diputados
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- El Comite Central de Direccion Electoral para las elecciones de diputados a las Asambleas Populares de las provincias (las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro), las ciudades (los municipios) y los distritos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 26 la informacion del resultado electoral.
					  Segun la nota, esos comicios terminaron exitosamente el dia 24 en todos los distritos electorales del pais conforme a la ley electoral correspondiente.
					
					  De acuerdo con el resumen de los datos ofrecidos por los comites electorales de provincias, ciudades y distritos, el 99.97 por ciento del padron electoral acudieron a las urnas y todos votaron a favor de los candidatos registrados en los respectivos colegios.
					
					  No participaron en la votacion los que estan en el extranjero o trabajan en alta mar.
					
					  Esta vez resultaron electos como diputados a las asambleas populares de provincias, ciudades y distritos 28 mil 116 obreros, campesinos, intelectuales y funcionarios que trabajan abnegadamente por el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y la construccion de la gran potencia prospera acatando con fidelidad la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  Las elecciones volvieron a manifestar al exterior y al interior del pais la indoblegable conviccion y voluntad del pueblo coreano de realizar sin falta el deseo del Presidente Kim Il Sung de construir un Estado prospero dando acicates continuos al Chollima del Songun, unido firmemente en torno al Comite Central del Partido encabezado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. Al mismo tiempo, demostraron el poderio de la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias y la superioridad del socialismo al estilo coreano.
					
					  Los organos locales del poder de la RPDC fueron renovados con los funcionarios competentes y los representantes obreros, campesinos e intelectuales quienes marchan al frente de la marcha en gran auge para el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo trabajando con abnegacion por el partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo y librando la ofensiva para superar el nivel sofisticado en todos los sectores.
					
					  Las presentes elecciones constituyeron asi un hito importante para consolidar el poder popular.

articles.title: RPDC critica al Sur de Corea por obstaculizar ajuste de bienes
articles.content:
RPDC critica al Sur de Corea por obstaculizar ajuste de bienes
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- En relacion con las negociaciones sobre el ajuste de bienes inmuebles de la parte Sur en la zona del monte Kumgang, el portavoz de la Direccion de la Zona Especial del Turismo Internacional al Monte Kumgang de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 26 la siguiente respuesta a la ATCC: 
					 Para el ajuste de bienes inmuebles en la zona del monte Kumgang de acuerdo con el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC sobre el establecimiento de la zona especial del turismo internacional al monte Kumgang y la ley de la zona especial del turismo internacional al monte Kumgang de la RPDC, tomamos unas medidas para permitir a los interesados surcoreanos registrar nuevamente sus negocios y bienes presentandose en el monte Kumgang, participar en el turismo internacional o disponer sus bienes de la manera que quisieran como alquilar, traspasar y vender sus bienes. 
					
					 Esto partio de la intencion de reanudar cuanto antes el turismo al monte Kumgang, largamente suspendido debido a la injusta actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas, mostrar a mucho mas personas este monte famoso de la nacion coreana y garantizar los intereses de las empresas surcoreanas. 
					
					 Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas trataron con insinceridad nuestras medidas e impidieron intencionalmente a las empresas surcoreanas viajar al monte Kumgang para disponer sus propiedades. 
					
					 Impotentes de resistir las criticas de nuestra parte y las protestas de las empresas surcoreanas, ellas vinieron al monte Kumgang con representantes de algunas de entre mas de 30 empresas que tienen sus inmuebles en ese monte, pero, impidieron a ellos reunirse con nuestra parte y hablar libremente en la mesa de dialogo, insistiendo solo en las negociaciones de autoridades. 
					
					 Por eso, si bien se realizaron en dos ocasiones las negociaciones para ese fin, no pudimos intercambiar las opiniones con las empresas civiles surcoreanas. 
					
					 Tomando en consideracion la situacion de las empresas surcoreanas que sufren danos injustamente por el despotismo de las autoridades, decidimos ultimar ese problema hasta el 29 de julio. 
					
					 En lugar de sentirse culpables, las autoridades surcoreanas insisten en su posicion injusta hablando de la "revocacion de la ley de la zona especial", de la "violacion del acuerdo Sur-Norte" y de la "violacion del derecho sobre propiedades". Y propusieron las conversaciones de trabajo de autoridades con el intento de arrogarse el derecho a las negociaciones para el arreglo de bienes y el turismo, excluyendo a las empresas civiles. 
					
					 Ademas, en cuanto a la reanudacion del turismo por la parte Sur, tema que centra la atencion de la opinion publica interna y externa, pretenden obstaculizarla de la peor forma hablando del "mantenimiento de la posicion establecida". 
					
					 Hemos declarado la zona turistica al monte Kumgang como la zona especial de turismo internacional e instituido la nueva ley especial al respecto. Esta medida apegada a la ley corresponde al hecho de que las autoridades surcoreanas suspendieron unilateralmente durante 3 anos el turismo al monte Kumgang bajo pretextos injustos. 
					
					 En cuanto a la supuesta "violacion del acuerdo" y la "violacion del derechos sobre propiedades", las mismas autoridades surcoreanas violaron y rompieron el acuerdo entre Hyundai y la RPDC y causaron tremendos danos a esta y empresas surcoreanas.
					
					 Ellas interrumpieron unilateralmente el turismo al monte Kungang, que marchaba bien entre la RPDC y Hyundai, sin ninguna consulta con los firmantes del acuerdo e impiden hasta hoy su reanudacion.
					
					 El incidente de la turista surcoreana, pretexto usado por las autoridades surcoreanas, es una desgracia ocurrida debido a la intrusion ilegal en la zona de control militar de la RPDC causada por la falta de control de turistas y la responsabilidad recae enteramente sobre la parte surcoreana.
					
					 La parte surena no ha pagado mucho dinero que debe a la RPDC por concepto de turismo al monte Kumgang.
					
					 Ya no vale la pena hablar del acuerdo Norte-Sur convertido en letra muerta hace mucho tiempo.
					
					 Aun bajo estas circunstancias, hemos hecho el gran favor de seguir concediendo a Hyundai el derecho de turismo de la parte surena en virtud de la nueva ley de la zona especial y dar la oportunidad de negociar para la proteccion del derecho sobre propiedades de las empresas surcoreanas. 
					
					 De hecho, el ajuste de los bienes en la zona especial del turismo internacional al monte Kumgang se puede realizar segun la ley de la RPDC y no hace falta discutirlo con la parte surena, porque la zona esta bajo la jurisdiccion de nuestra parte.
					
					 A pesar de esto, las autoridades surcoreanas lo obstaculizan partiendo de su intento de frustrar el turismo internacional e impedir la reanudacion del turismo patrocinado por la parte surena.
					
					 Pero, esa astucia es insuficiente para enganar a la gente.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas deben enviar a los representantes de empresas surcoreanas que tienen bienes en el monte Kumgang hasta el 29 de julio, definido por nuestra parte como fecha limite, para que ellos puedan registrar de nuevo sus negocios y bienes, participar en el turismo internacional o alquilar, traspasar y vender sus propiedades, etc.
					
					 A tales condiciones, tomaremos en consideracion las conversaciones de trabajo de las autoridades Norte-Sur presentadas por el segundo.
					
					 Estamos preparados tanto para el turismo internacional como para la reanudacion del turismo auspiciado por la parte surena.
					
					 Si las autoridades surcoreanas intentan utilizar las conversaciones de trabajo entre las autoridades como el espacio para obstaculizar la ejecucion de la ley de la zona especial y el ajuste de bienes rehusando la justa demanda de la RPDC y excluyendo las empresas civiles surcoreanas, no las aceptaremos y pasaremos resueltamente a la disposicion legal de los bienes de la parte surena como hemos declarado ya.

articles.title: Acto central por el 58o aniversario del triunfo en la guerra coreana
articles.content:
Acto central por el 58o aniversario del triunfo en la guerra coreana
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 58o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (25 de junio de 1950 - 27 de julio de 1953).
					 El 27 de julio del 42 (1953) de la Era Juche es el dia de segunda liberacion en que bajo la destacada direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea lograron la victoria historica aniquilando a las fuerzas agresivas encabezadas por Estados Unidos y defendieron honrosamente la libertad y la independencia de la patria y las conquistas de la revolucion.
					
					 Asistieron al acto los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales,  oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, funcionarios de sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion,  veteranos de guerra de liberacion de la patria, familiares de los militares del EPC, trabajadores, compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					 El submariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, en su informe, senalo que gracias a la destacada direccion del Presidente el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea pudieron crear el ejemplo brillante de la guerra revolucionaria antiimperialista de haber aniquilado la supremacia numerica y tecnica de los enemigos con la politico-ideologica y estrategico-tactica, y prosigue:
					
					 Al lograr la victoria en la guerra coreana, la patria y el pueblo coreano se pusieron de pleno manifiesto la dignidad del pais y el pueblo heroicos que aniquilaron en un siglo a dos fuertes enemigos imperialistas y estimularon dinamicamente a los pueblos revolucionarios del mundo que se oponen a la agresion de las fuerzas extranjeras y aspiran la independencia.
					
					 Las inmortales hazanas de la victoria en la guerra y las preciosas tradiciones logradas por el Presidente se mantienen y se heredan firmemente por la sabia direccion del Songun del Dirigente        Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Llevando adelante con exito la idea y la linea de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas y los asuntos militares del Presidente, el Dirigente dirigio en la delantera la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea dejando desde a principios de la decada de 1960 sus huellas de la direccion revolucionaria del Songun.
					
					 Al presentar el ejercito popular como unidad nuclear y grueso de la revolucion y formular la politica de Songun como modo politico principal del socialismo, aseguro las poderosas armas de la defensa de la patria y la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui.
					
					 Nuestra patria gana victoria tras victoria en el combate de enfrentamiento contra las fuerzas aliadas de los imperialistas manifestando su poderio de la potencia politico-ideologica y la militar de talla mundial y bajo la firme garantia militar el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea crean los milagros y proezas sorprendentes al mundo en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera se deben a que ellos tienen al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, comandante legendario del Songun y patriotico sin igual, en el puesto supremo del partido, el ejercito y el Estado.
					
					 Todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes coreanos deben frustrar rotundamente las imprudentes y brutales campanas conflictivas anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda de Lee Myung Bak y registrar el cambio decisivo en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista y en la causa por la reunificacion de la patria segun la direccion del Songun del gran partido.
					
					 Debido a las siniestras maquinaciones de provocacion politica y militar de la banda de los traidores y los maniacos del circulo militar del Sur de Corea perpetradas bajo el amparo de EE.UU., se crea en la Peninsula Coreana la situacion muy tirante de estallarse la guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					 La banda del traidor Lee, que dando espaldas a los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC por la paz y la  reunificacion perpetraron las campanas conflictivas anti-RPDC, ofenda la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y calumnia cruelmente el regimen y el ejercito de esta.
					
					 Las fuerzas revolucionarias de Corea, que considera tales locuras de Lee de una nueva declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC, aniquilaran totalmente a los traidores de la nacion con las justas fuerzas armadas de represalia y aceleraran a toda costa la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun subraya originalidad de filosofia Juche
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun subraya originalidad de filosofia Juche
 Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo el dia 26 en su edicion un articulo individual dedicado al 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "La filosofia Juche es una original filosofia revolucionaria".
					 Esta obra, publicada el 26 de julio del 85 (1996) de la Era Juche, aclara claramente que el merito historico de la filosofia Juche en el proceso de las ideas filosoficas no esta en haber desarrollado la filosofia de la clase obrera precedente sino en haber definido nuevos principios filosoficos centrados en el hombre.
					
					 Se refiere a que si se interpreta esta filosofia en el marco de la antecedente no podra comprenderse correctamente su esencia.
					
					 Al aclararse el hecho de  que la filosofia Juche es una filosofia original cuyas tareas y principios difieren de modo radical de los de la filosofia precedente, se preparo una arma ideo-teorica capaz de realizar cabalmente el estudio, la explicacion y la propaganda sobre esta filosofia conforme a la idea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, senala  el articulo y continua:
					
					 La filosofia Juche aclara originalmente que el ser social es solamente el hombre  y el caracter esencial de este contiene la independencia, el espiritu creador y la conciencia.
					
					 Al asegurarse plenamente la correcta comprension jucheana gracias a la filosofia Juche sobre el hombre se puso punto final a la opinion erronea que considera las caracteristicas esenciales del hombre como producto de su atributo natural y biologico, como resultado de su desarrollo.
					
					 Ademas, se ha mantenido firmemente la pureza de la filosofia Juche y fortalecido la base ideologica del socialismo al estilo coreano.
					
					 En las complicadas situaciones politicas del mundo el socialismo al estilo coreano sale siempre victorioso manifestando su superioridad, porque el PTC defendio cabalmente el socialismo ateniendose a la filosofia Juche centrada en el hombre y en las masas populares.
					
					 Esta filosofia es la doctrina revolucionaria que  refleja correctamente las exigencias y las aspiraciones de las masas populares y generaliza las experiencias de lucha logradas bajo la direccion del partido y el lider.
					
					 Por este motivo, la filosofia Juche sirve de una filosofia popular que posibilita a las masas populares comprender con facilidad y tomar como arma de su lucha y de una enciclopedia que da respuestas a todos los asuntos que se presentan en la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					 Hoy dia, todas las cosas planeadas por el PTC  parten de la mas correcta concepcion y posicion sobre las masas populares.
